name: BlockHopper
description:
This is a game about placing blocks, and jumping off of blocks. However, blocks will fall to the ground and explode when you jump from them, and you can only place a limited number of blocks while in the air, so be careful! Speedrun timer included.

Controls:

Move: A/D or Left/Right Arrows

Jump:  K or X

Place Block: L or Z

Shift Camera: W/S or Up/Down Arrows

This was initially made for VimJam 3, however I couldn't think of a way for it to fit the theme of "Turn up the heat", so I developed it further and came out with this.
